1â†’"""
     2â†’VibeLife API - The Living Companion Backend
     3â†’
     4â†’v6.8 é‡æ„ç‰ˆæœ¬:
     5â†’- ç»Ÿä¸€ Skill Gateway (/api/v1/skills/*)
     6â†’- ç»Ÿä¸€ Account è·¯ç”± (/api/v1/account/*)
     7â†’- ç»Ÿä¸€ Commerce è·¯ç”± (/api/v1/commerce/*)
     8â†’"""
     9â†’import os
    10â†’import time
    11â†’import logging
    12â†’from pathlib import Path
    13â†’from contextlib import asynccontextmanager
    14â†’
    15â†’from fastapi import FastAPI, Request
    16â†’from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware
    17â†’
    18â†’# NOTE: Avoid importing asyncpg-backed DB layer at module import time.
    19â†’# In tests (VIBELIFE_ENV=test), we lazy-import in lifespan to avoid requiring asyncpg.
    20â†’
    21â†’# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    22â†’# Logging Configuration
    23â†’# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    24â†’
    25â†’# é…ç½® root logger è¾“å‡º INFO çº§åˆ«æ—¥å¿—åˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°
    26â†’logging.basicConfig(
    27â†’    level=logging.INFO,
    28â†’    format='%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
    29â†’    datefmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'
    30â†’)
    31â†’
    32â†’log_dir = Path(os.environ.get("VIBELIFE_LOGS_ROOT", "/tmp/vibelife/logs"))
    33â†’log_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
    34â†’
    35â†’request_logger = logging.getLogger("vibelife.requests")
    36â†’request_logger.setLevel(logging.INFO)
    37â†’
    38â†’file_handler = logging.FileHandler(log_dir / "api_requests.log")
    39â†’file_handler.setFormatter(logging.Formatter(
    40â†’    '%(asctime)s - %(message)s',
    41â†’    datefmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'
    42â†’))
    43â†’request_logger.addHandler(file_handler)
    44â†’
    45â†’# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    46â†’# Load environment (.env at repo root)
    47â†’# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    48â†’
    49â†’try:
    50â†’    from dotenv import load_dotenv
    51â†’except ImportError:
    52â†’    load_dotenv = None
    53â†’
    54â†’if load_dotenv:
    55â†’    env_path = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[2] / ".env"
    56â†’    if env_path.exists():
    57â†’        load_dotenv(env_path, override=False)
    58â†’
    59â†’# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ï¿½ï¿½â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    60â†’# Lifespan (startup/shutdown)
    61â†’# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
    62â†’
    63â†’@asynccontextmanager
    64â†’async def lifespan(app: FastAPI):
    65â†’    """Application lifespan handler"""
    66â†’    # Startup
    67â†’    print("Starting VibeLife API v7.0...")
    68â†’
    69â†’    TEST_MODE = os.getenv("VIBELIFE_ENV") == "test"
    70â†’
    71â†’    # Lazy import DB only when not running tests to avoid asyncpg requirement
    72â†’    if not TEST_MODE:
    73â†’        from stores.db import init_db  # type: ignore
    74â†’        await init_db()
    75â†’        print("Database connected")
    76â†’    else:
    77â†’        print("Test mode: skipping DB initialization")
    78â†’
    79â†’    # Initialize Tool Registry (v6.0)
    80â†’    if not TEST_MODE:
    81â†’        try:
    82â†’            from services.agent import ToolRegistry
    83â†’            import services.agent.global_handlers  # noqa: F401
    84â†’            ToolRegistry.initialize()
    85â†’            print(f"ToolRegistry initialized: {len(ToolRegistry._handlers)} handlers")
    86â†’        except Exception as e:
    87â†’            print(f"ToolRegistry init skipped/failed: {e}")
    88â†’
    89â†’    # Initialize Skill Service Registry (v6.8)
    90â†’    if not TEST_MODE:
    91â†’        try:
    92â†’            from services.agent.skill_service_registry import SkillServiceRegistry
    93â†’            SkillServiceRegistry.initialize()
    94â†’            print(f"SkillServiceRegistry initialized: {len(SkillServiceRegistry._services)} services")
    95â†’        except Exception as e:
    96â†’            print(f"SkillServiceRegistry init skipped/failed: {e}")
    97â†’
    98â†’    yield
    99â†’
   100â†’    # Shutdown
   101â†’    print("Shutting down VibeLife API...")
   102â†’
   103â†’    if not TEST_MODE:
   104â†’        try:
   105â†’            from stores.db import close_db  # type: ignore
   106â†’            await close_db()
   107â†’            print("Database closed")
   108â†’        except Exception as e:
   109â†’            print(f"DB close skipped/failed: {e}")
   110â†’
   111â†’
   112â†’# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
   113â†’# App Creation
   114â†’# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
   115â†’
   116â†’app = FastAPI(
   117â†’    title="VibeLife API",
   118â†’    description="The Living Companion - AI-powered personal growth platform",
   119â†’    version="7.0.0",
   120â†’    lifespan=lifespan,
   121â†’    docs_url=None,
   122â†’    redoc_url=None,

"""
VibeLife API - The Living Companion Backend

v6.8 é‡æ„ç‰ˆæœ¬:
- ç»Ÿä¸€ Skill Gateway (/api/v1/skills/*)
- ç»Ÿä¸€ Account è·¯ç”± (/api/v1/account/*)
- ç»Ÿä¸€ Commerce è·¯ç”± (/api/v1/commerce/*)
"""
import os
import time
import logging
from pathlib import Path
from contextlib import asynccontextmanager

from fastapi import FastAPI, Request
from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware

# NOTE: Avoid importing asyncpg-backed DB layer at module import time.
# In tests (VIBELIFE_ENV=test), we lazy-import in lifespan to avoid requiring asyncpg.

# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
# Logging Configuration
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

# é…ç½® root logger è¾“å‡º INFO çº§åˆ«æ—¥å¿—åˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°
logging.basicConfig(
    level=logging.INFO,
    format='%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
    datefmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'
)

log_dir = Path(os.environ.get("VIBELIFE_LOGS_ROOT", "/tmp/vibelife/logs"))
log_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

request_logger = logging.getLogger("vibelife.requests")
request_logger.setLevel(logging.INFO)

file_handler = logging.FileHandler(log_dir / "api_requests.log")
file_handler.setFormatter(logging.Formatter(
    '%(asctime)s - %(message)s',
    datefmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'
))
request_logger.addHandler(file_handler)

# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
# Load environment (.env at repo root)
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

try:
    from dotenv import load_dotenv
except ImportError:
    load_dotenv = None

if load_dotenv:
    env_path = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[2] / ".env"
    if env_path.exists():
        load_dotenv(env_path, override=False)

# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ï¿½ï¿½â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
# Lifespan (startup/shutdown)
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

@asynccontextmanager
async def lifespan(app: FastAPI):
    """Application lifespan handler"""
    # Startup
    print("Starting VibeLife API v7.0...")

    TEST_MODE = os.getenv("VIBELIFE_ENV") == "test"

    # Lazy import DB only when not running tests to avoid asyncpg requirement
    if not TEST_MODE:
        from stores.db import init_db  # type: ignore
        await init_db()
        print("Database connected")
    else:
        print("Test mode: skipping DB initialization")

    # Initialize Tool Registry (v6.0)
    if not TEST_MODE:
        try:
            from services.agent import ToolRegistry
            import services.agent.global_handlers  # noqa: F401
            ToolRegistry.initialize()
            print(f"ToolRegistry initialized: {len(ToolRegistry._handlers)} handlers")
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"ToolRegistry init skipped/failed: {e}")

    # Initialize Skill Service Registry (v6.8)
    if not TEST_MODE:
        try:
            from services.agent.skill_service_registry import SkillServiceRegistry
            SkillServiceRegistry.initialize()
            print(f"SkillServiceRegistry initialized: {len(SkillServiceRegistry._services)} services")
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"SkillServiceRegistry init skipped/failed: {e}")

    yield

    # Shutdown
    print("Shutting down VibeLife API...")

    if not TEST_MODE:
        try:
            from stores.db import close_db  # type: ignore
            await close_db()
            print("Database closed")
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"DB close skipped/failed: {e}")


# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
# App Creation
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

app = FastAPI(
    title="VibeLife API",
    description="The Living Companion - AI-powered personal growth platform",
    version="7.0.0",
    lifespan=lifespan,
    docs_url=None,
    redoc_url=None,
)

# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
# CORS Middleware
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

cors_origins = os.getenv("VIBELIFE_CORS_ORIGINS", "http://localhost:3000").split(",")

app.add_middleware(
    CORSMiddleware,
    allow_origins=cors_origins,
    allow_credentials=True,
    allow_methods=["*"],
    allow_headers=["*"],
)


# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
# Request Logging Middleware
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

@app.middleware("http")
async def log_requests(request: Request, call_next):
    """è®°å½•æ‰€æœ‰ HTTP è¯·æ±‚çš„è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯"""
    start_time = time.time()

    client_ip = request.client.host if request.client else "unknown"
    xff = request.headers.get("x-forwarded-for", "-")

v6.8 é‡æ„ç‰ˆæœ¬:
- ç»Ÿä¸€ Skill Gateway (/api/v1/skills/*)

import time
import logging

from contextlib import asynccontextmanager

from fastapi import FastAPI, Request
from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware

# Logging Configuration
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

# é…ç½® root logger è¾“å‡º INFO çº§åˆ«æ—¥å¿—åˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°
logging.basicConfig(
    level=logging.INFO,
    format='%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
    datefmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'
)

log_dir = Path(os.environ.get("VIBELIFE_LOGS_ROOT", "/tmp/vibelife/logs"))
log_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

request_logger = logging.getLogger("vibelife.requests")
request_logger.setLevel(logging.INFO)

file_handler = logging.FileHandler(log_dir / "api_requests.log")
file_handler.setFormatter(logging.Formatter(
    '%(asctime)s - %(message)s',
    datefmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'
))
request_logger.addHandler(file_handler)

# Lifespan (startup/shutdown)
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

@asynccontextmanager
async def lifespan(app: FastAPI):
    """Application lifespan handler"""
    # Startup
    print("Starting VibeLife API v7.0...")

    TEST_MODE = os.getenv("VIBELIFE_ENV") == "test"

    # Lazy import DB only when not running tests to avoid asyncpg requirement
    if not TEST_MODE:
        from stores.db import init_db  # type: ignore
        await init_db()
        print("Database connected")
    else:
        print("Test mode: skipping DB initialization")

    # Initialize Tool Registry (v6.0)
    if not TEST_MODE:
        try:
            from services.agent import ToolRegistry
            import services.agent.global_handlers  # noqa: F401
            ToolRegistry.initialize()
            print(f"ToolRegistry initialized: {len(ToolRegistry._handlers)} handlers")
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"ToolRegistry init skipped/failed: {e}")

    # Initialize Skill Service Registry (v6.8)
    if not TEST_MODE:
        try:
            from services.agent.skill_service_registry import SkillServiceRegistry
            SkillServiceRegistry.initialize()
            print(f"SkillServiceRegistry initialized: {len(SkillServiceRegistry._services)} services")
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"SkillServiceRegistry init skipped/failed: {e}")

    yield

    # Shutdown
    print("Shutting down VibeLife API...")

    if not TEST_MODE:
        try:
            from stores.db import close_db  # type: ignore
            await close_db()
            print("Database closed")
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"DB close skipped/failed: {e}")

app = FastAPI(
    title="VibeLife API",
    description="The Living Companion - AI-powered personal growth platform",
    version="7.0.0",
    lifespan=lifespan,
    docs_url=None,
    redoc_url=None,
)

# CORS Middleware
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

cors_origins = os.getenv("VIBELIFE_CORS_ORIGINS", "http://localhost:3000").split(",")

app.add_middleware(
    CORSMiddleware,
    allow_origins=cors_origins,
    allow_credentials=True,
    allow_methods=["*"],
    allow_headers=["*"],
)

# Request Logging Middleware
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

@app.middleware("http")
async def log_requests(request: Request, call_next):
    """è®°å½•æ‰€æœ‰ HTTP è¯·æ±‚çš„è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯"""
    start_time = time.time()

    client_ip = request.client.host if request.client else "unknown"
    xff = request.headers.get("x-forwarded-for", "-")
    x_real_ip = request.headers.get("x-real-ip", "-")
    cf_ip = request.headers.get("cf-connecting-ip", "-")

    response = await call_next(request)

    process_time = (time.time() - start_time) * 1000

    request_logger.info(
        f'{client_ip} "{request.method} {request.url.path}" '
        f'{response.status_code} {process_time:.2f}ms '
        f'xff="{xff}" xrealip="{x_real_ip}" cf_ip="{cf_ip}" '
        f'ua="{request.headers.get("user-agent", "-")}"'
    )

    return response

@app.get("/api/v1/config/current")
async def get_current_config():
    """è·å–å½“å‰ LLM æ¨¡å‹é…ç½®"""

        from services.model_router import get_model_config
        config = get_model_config()
        return {
            "providers": {

                for pid, p in config.providers.items()
            },
            "models": {
                mid: {"provider": m.provider, "model_name": m.model_name}
                for mid, m in config.models.items()

                for cap, route in config.defaults.items()
